title: Am i missing something
body:
I've had level 0 honor for the past 6 months, and i don't even believe i can get tier 5 rewards by the end of the year at this rate. 
Wasn't Riot going to make it easier? 
To clarify how my behavior in game has been, I don't act shittily, i just enjoy playing stupid jungles like brand and vayne.
 I know i suck at league but getting reported for sucking sucks.

(go ahead and look at my match history, im proud that i jungle everything lol)

replies.body: What punishment have you received to be at honor 0?

> [{quoted}](name=Kaioko,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=aH2ewM96,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-30T16:31:24.299+0000)
>
> What punishment have you received to be at honor 0?

Someone stole my lane so i fed in the lane he stole from me. I don't do that anymore obviously, i play jungle so this doesn't happen. And when it does i happily double jungle. Most of my double jungle games like this are wins because i share
You cant have lvl 0 honor. EVERYONE starts at lvl 1.

> [{quoted}](name=DrTeath,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=aH2ewM96,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-30T09:03:56.654+0000)
>
> You cant have lvl 0 honor. EVERYONE starts at lvl 1.

actually false! You start at level 2 honor and there are 3 checkpoints from level 0 (you were suspended/banned) to level 1, level 1 to 2, all the way to 5. chat restrictions take you from whatever level you were, in most cases level 2 or 3 and drops you to level 1 checkpoint 0. You need to then prove you are honorable enough in game to keep yourself calm and work towards winning every game you play. Everyone has a chance at honor level 5 this way, just that people who deserve it with good behavior get it. Hopefully this helps :)
My mistake , should have fact checked myself.

> [{quoted}](name=DrTeath,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=aH2ewM96,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-03-30T09:29:08.425+0000)
>
> My mistake , should have fact checked myself.

no problem. i have a dirty habit of not fact checking myself sometimes. i find it is a common thing that's why i wasn't so mean in my comment. i believe in education > aggression. that's why my passion is teaching but i'll never be a professor.
